help-file.title: WRITE
help-file.content:
Syntax: board write <subject> <--one line, then press ENTER <balance of message> <--your message /s <--to exit message, then press ENTER
This is used to write a message on a bulletin board or a piece of paper. Please keep profanity out of your messages, as they can be read by anyone in the game. You can also remove your message by using the following syntax: "remove <message #>."
You can only delete messages written by you.
Typing /h during the balance of the message gives you a menu of options.
